titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the opening of the lecture at Maldon in Essex, lately established by the Lord Bishop of London in vindication of the antiquity of the doctrine of the Church of England / by William Bramston ...
titleStmt.author: Bramston, William, d. 1735.

notesStmt.note: "Published at the request of the auditory."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
